about_the_game:
The Season 3 Ultimate Boost Pack is even more powerful than the Season 2 version!

Enjoy triple premium buffs, double drop rates, and double Premium Points for maximum advantage. This season, you’ll also receive one SS Transformation Card Box to boost your gameplay even further.

Contents

  • 3 of Premium Buff Set (Consumable item)
    - Effect Drop Rate x2
    - Premium Point x2

  • SS Transform Card *1 (Consumable item)

    - You can randomly obtain an SS Rank transformation card.

■ Notices

- This DLC contains consumable items and is non-refundable.

- The DLC will be instantly delivered to your DK Shop Inventory

- Each account can only purchase each DLC once.

- DLC contents will be maintained during season3 (about 10 months)

* Season 3 started on Dec 24, 2024

- DLC contents are subject to change after prior notice.
